template.name: Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1
template.description: Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER TODO: Discovery GPS status, Discovery DFS status, Cnfig Section

item.name: Radio link name
item.description: UBNT-MIB::linkName Radio Link Name

item.name: Ethernet Inbound frames with alignment errors
item.description: UBNT-MIB::rxAlignErr Eth Data Port Receive Alignment Errors

item.name: Ethernet bad frames received
item.description: UBNT-MIB::rxErroredFrames Eth Data Port Bad Frames Received

item.name: Ethernet Inbound frames with errors
item.description: UBNT-MIB::rxFrameCrcErr Eth Data Port CRC Errors

item.name: Ethernet frames recived
item.description: UBNT-MIB::rxFramesOK Eth Data Port RX Frames

item.name: Ethernet bits recived
item.description: UBNT-MIB::rxOctetsOK Eth Data Port RX Octets

item.name: Ethernet pause frames received
item.description: UBNT-MIB::rxPauseFrames Eth Data Port Pause Frames Received

item.name: Ethernet bad frames sent
item.description: UBNT-MIB::txErroredFrames Eth Data Port Bad Frames Transmitted

item.name: Ethernet frames sent
item.description: UBNT-MIB::txFramesOK Eth Data Port TX Frames

item.name: Ethernet bits sent
item.description: UBNT-MIB::txOctetsOK Eth Data Port TX Octets

item.name: Ethernet pause frames sent
item.description: UBNT-MIB::txPauseFrames Eth Data Port Pause Frames Transmitted

item.name: Configured country code
item.description: UBNT-MIB::countryCode Configured Country Code

item.name: Radio link distance
item.description: UBNT-MIB::radioLinkDistM Radio Link Distance (Meters)

item.name: Ethernet info
item.description: UBNT-MIB::ethDataPortInfo Ethernet Data Port Link Connection Speed

item.name: Ethernet state
item.description: UBNT-MIB::ethDataPortState Ethernet Data Port State

item.name: Radio link connection information
item.description: UBNT-MIB::radioLinkInfo Radio Link Connection Information

item.name: Current transmit modulation rate
item.description: UBNT-MIB::curTXModRate Current Transmit Modulation Rate

item.name: Radio link state
item.description: UBNT-MIB::radioLinkState Radio Link State

item.name: Radio link uptime
item.description: UBNT-MIB::linkUpTime Radio Link uptime (seconds)

item.name: Remote radio IP address
item.description: UBNT-MIB::remoteIP Remote radio IP Address

item.name: Remote radio MAC address
item.description: UBNT-MIB::remoteMAC Remote radio MAC Address

item.name: Remote transmit modulation rate
item.description: UBNT-MIB::remoteTXModRate Remote Transmit Modulation Rate

item.name: Remote radio reciver gain
item.description: UBNT-MIB::remoteRXGain Remote radio Receiver Gain

item.name: Remote radio chain 0 overloaded
item.description: UBNT-MIB::remoteRXPower0Overload Remote Radio Chain 0 RX Overloaded

item.name: Remote radio chain 1 overloaded
item.description: UBNT-MIB::remoteRXPower1Overload Remote Radio Chain 1 RX Overloaded

item.name: Remote radio chain 0 receive power
item.description: UBNT-MIB::remoteRXPower0 Remote Radio Chain 0 RX Power Level (dBm)

item.name: Remote radio chain 0 valid power
item.description: UBNT-MIB::remoteRXPower0Valid Remote Radio Chain 0 RX Power Valid

item.name: Remote radio chain 1 receive power
item.description: UBNT-MIB::remoteRXPower1 Remote Radio Chain 1 RX Power Level (dBm)

item.name: Remote radio chain 1 valid power
item.description: UBNT-MIB::remoteRXPower1Valid Remote Radio Chain 1 RX Power Valid

item.name: Remote radio transmit power
item.description: UBNT-MIB::remoteTXPower Remote Radio Transmit Power Level (dBm)

item.name: Radio chain 0 overloaded
item.description: UBNT-MIB::rxOverload0 Radio Chain 0 RX Overloaded

item.name: Radio chain 1 overloaded
item.description: UBNT-MIB::rxOverload1 Radio Chain 1 RX Overloaded

item.name: Radio chain 0 receive power
item.description: UBNT-MIB::rxPower0 Radio Chain 0 RX Power Level (dBm)

item.name: Radio chain 0 valid power
item.description: UBNT-MIB::rxPower0Valid Radio Chain 0 RX Power Valid

item.name: Radio chain 1 receive power
item.description: UBNT-MIB::rxPower1 Radio Chain 1 RX Power Level (dBm)

item.name: Radio chain 1 valid power
item.description: UBNT-MIB::rxPower1Valid Radio Chain 1 RX Power Valid

item.name: Receive throughput capacity
item.description: UBNT-MIB::rxCapacity Radio Receive Throughput Capacity (bits/sec)

item.name: Radio chain 0 DAC temperature
item.description: UBNT-MIB::radio0TempC Radio Chain 0 DAC Temperature (C)

item.name: Radio chain 1 DAC temperature
item.description: UBNT-MIB::radio1TempC Radio Chain 1 DAC Temperature (C)

item.name: Trasnsmit throughput capacity
item.description: UBNT-MIB::rxCapacity Radio Transmit Throughput Capacity (bits/sec)

item.name: Board uptime
item.description: UBNT-MIB::upTime Board uptime (seconds)

item.name: Radio chain receive power delta
item.description: Difference between Horizontal / Vertical channels.

item.name: Ethernet speed
item.description: Extract value from UBNT-MIB::ethDataPortInfo

item.name: CPU utilization
item.description: MIB: FROGFOOT-RESOURCES-MIB 5 minute load average of processor load.

item.name: Firmware version
item.description: UBNT-MIB::fwVersion Board Firmware Revision

item.name: Hardware model name
item.description: MIB: IEEE802dot11-MIB A printable string used to identify the manufacturer's product name of the resource. Maximum string length is 128 octets.

item.name: Available memory
item.description: MIB: FROGFOOT-RESOURCES-MIB

item.name: Memory utilization
item.description: Memory utilization in %

item.name: Total memory
item.description: MIB: FROGFOOT-RESOURCES-MIB Total memory in Bytes

trigger.expression: {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:system.hw.firmware.str({$HW.FIRMWARE:"UBNT.AIRFIBER"})}=0 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:system.hw.firmware.strlen()}>0
trigger.recovery_expression: {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:system.hw.firmware.str({$HW.FIRMWARE:"UBNT.AIRFIBER"})}=1 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:system.hw.firmware.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: Firmware differ from required
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Firmware version differ from {$HW.FIRMWARE:"UBNT.AIRFIBER"}.

trigger.expression: {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:system.hw.firmware.diff()}=1 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:system.hw.firmware.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: Firmware has changed
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Firmware version has changed. Ack to close

trigger.expression: {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:snmp.str2num.sh[1,"{$SNMP_COMMUNITY}","{HOST.IP}","1.3.6.1.4.1.41112.1.3.2.1.43.1"].change()}<0 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:snmp.str2num.sh[1,"{$SNMP_COMMUNITY}","{HOST.IP}","1.3.6.1.4.1.41112.1.3.2.1.43.1"].last()}>0 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.eth.state.last()}>0
trigger.recovery_expression: ({Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:snmp.str2num.sh[1,"{$SNMP_COMMUNITY}","{HOST.IP}","1.3.6.1.4.1.41112.1.3.2.1.43.1"].change()}>0 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:snmp.str2num.sh[1,"{$SNMP_COMMUNITY}","{HOST.IP}","1.3.6.1.4.1.41112.1.3.2.1.43.1"].prev()}>0) or {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.eth.state.last()}<1
trigger.name: Interface Ethernet: Has changed to lower speed than it was before
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This Ethernet connection has transitioned down from its known maximum speed. This might be a sign of autonegotiation issues. Ack to close.

dependency.name: Interface Ethernet: Link down
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"ETH"}=1 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.eth.state.last()}<1 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.eth.state.diff()}=1

trigger.expression: {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.statistics.eth.rx.octets.avg(15m)}>({$IF_UTIL_MAX}/100)*{Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.rx.speed.last()} or {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.statistics.eth.tx.octets.avg(15m)}>({$IF_UTIL_MAX}/100)*{Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.tx.speed.last()}
trigger.recovery_expression: {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.statistics.eth.rx.octets.avg(15m)}<(({$IF_UTIL_MAX}-3)/100)*{Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.rx.speed.last()} or {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.statistics.eth.tx.octets.avg(15m)}<(({$IF_UTIL_MAX}-3)/100)*{Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.tx.speed.last()}
trigger.name: Interface Ethernet: High bandwidth usage >{$IF_UTIL_MAX}% radio linc capacity

dependency.name: Interface Ethernet: Link down
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"ETH"}=1 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.eth.state.last()}<1 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.eth.state.diff()}=1

dependency.name: Interface Radio: Link lost
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"AIR"}=1 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.radio.state.last()}<1 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.radio.state.diff()}=1

trigger.name: Interface Ethernet: High error rate
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Recovers when below 80% of {$IF_ERRORS_WARN} threshold

dependency.name: Interface Ethernet: Link down
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"ETH"}=1 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.eth.state.last()}<1 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.eth.state.diff()}=1

trigger.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"ETH"}=1 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.eth.state.last()}<1 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.eth.state.diff()}=1
trigger.name: Interface Ethernet: Link down
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Ethernet Interface is down. Don't rise if {$IFCONTROL:"ETH"}<>1

trigger.expression: {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.temp0.avg(5m)}>{$TEMP_CRIT:"CH0"} or {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.temp1.avg(5m)}>{$TEMP_CRIT:"CH1"}
trigger.recovery_expression: {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.temp0.avg(5m)}<{$TEMP_CRIT:"CH0"}-3 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.temp1.avg(5m)}<{$TEMP_CRIT:"CH1"}-3
trigger.name: Interface Radio: DAC above critical threshold
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger.expression: {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.temp0.avg(5m)}>{$TEMP_WARN:"CH0"} or {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.temp1.avg(5m)}>{$TEMP_WARN:"CH1"}
trigger.recovery_expression: {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.temp0.avg(5m)}<{$TEMP_WARN:"CH0"}-3 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.temp1.avg(5m)}<{$TEMP_WARN:"CH1"}-3
trigger.name: Interface Radio: DAC above warning threshold
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

dependency.name: Interface Radio: DAC above critical threshold
dependency.expression: {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.temp0.avg(5m)}>{$TEMP_CRIT:"CH0"} or {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.temp1.avg(5m)}>{$TEMP_CRIT:"CH1"}
dependency.recovery_expression: {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.temp0.avg(5m)}<{$TEMP_CRIT:"CH0"}-3 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.temp1.avg(5m)}<{$TEMP_CRIT:"CH1"}-3

trigger.expression: {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.temp0.avg(5m)}<{$TEMP_CRIT_LOW:"CH0"} or {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.temp1.avg(5m)}<{$TEMP_CRIT_LOW:"CH1"}
trigger.recovery_expression: {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.temp0.avg(5m)}>{$TEMP_CRIT_LOW:"CH0"}+3 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.temp1.avg(5m)}>{$TEMP_CRIT_LOW:"CH1"}+3
trigger.name: Interface Radio: DAC temperature too low
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"AIR"}=1 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.radio.state.last()}<1 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.radio.state.diff()}=1
trigger.name: Interface Radio: Link lost
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Radio link is lost, don't rize if {$IFCONTROL:"AIR"}<>1

trigger.expression: {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.rx.overload0.last()}=1 or {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.rx.overload1.last()}=1
trigger.recovery_expression: {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.rx.overload0.last()}=2 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.rx.overload1.last()}=2
trigger.name: Interface Radio: Reciever Overload

trigger.expression: {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.remote.rx.power0.valid.last()}=2 or {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.remote.rx.power1.valid.last()}=2
trigger.recovery_expression: {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.remote.rx.power0.valid.last()}=1 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.remote.rx.power1.valid.last()}=1
trigger.name: Interface Radio: Reciever power invalid

trigger.expression: ({Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.rx.speed.avg(15m)}<{$RADIO_SPEED_MIN:"RX"} or {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.tx.speed.avg(15m)}<{$RADIO_SPEED_MIN:"TX"}) and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.radio.state.last()}>0
trigger.recovery_expression: ({Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.rx.speed.avg(5m)}>{$RADIO_SPEED_MIN:"RX"} and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.tx.speed.avg(5m)}>{$RADIO_SPEED_MIN:"TX"}) or {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.radio.state.last()}<1
trigger.name: Interface Radio: Throughput has low capacity
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This Radio connection has transitioned down lower than mimimum capacity. {$RADIO_SPEED_MIN:"TX"} for out, {$RADIO_SPEED_MIN:"RX"} for in. This might be a sign of autonegotiation issues. Ack to close.

dependency.name: Interface Radio: Link lost
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"AIR"}=1 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.radio.state.last()}<1 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.radio.state.diff()}=1

trigger.name: Radio has been restarted
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. The radio link uptime is less than 10 minutes

trigger.expression: {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.config.linkname.diff()}=1 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.config.linkname.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: Radio link name has changed
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Radio link name has changed. Ack to close

trigger.expression: {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.remote.mac.diff()}=1 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.remote.mac.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: Remote radio: MAC address was chabnged
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Remote MAC has changed. Ack to close

trigger.expression: {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.remote.ip.diff()}=1 and {Template Net Ubiquiti AirFIBER SNMPv1:airfiber.status.remote.ip.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: Remote radio: MAC address was chaned
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Remote MAC has changed. Ack to close
